department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Royal Canadian Mounted Police has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Ottawa, Ontario by September 29th 2023
full_summary:
### Rotary Chairs for RCMP

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Number**: cb-7657-38728259
* **Solicitation Number**: 202400001
* **Amendment Number**: 9
* **Publication Date**: July 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 18, 2023 (2:00 PM AST)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding

#### Goods and Services

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking quotations for the supply of rotary chairs and stools. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

The RCMP requires 150 rotary chairs and stools. The delivery and installation of the goods are to be made in Ottawa, Ontario by September 29, 2023.

#### Eligibility

Only pre-qualified and supply arrangement holders are eligible to submit bids. Non-supply arrangement holders may submit a bid, but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority for evaluation.

#### Contracting Authority

The Contracting Authority for this project is Shannon Plunkett, who can be reached at Shannon.Plunkett@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

#### Bid Submissions

Inquires regarding this project must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.

Bidders who wish to become pre-qualified supply arrangement holders should contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Documents

The bid solicitation document and other relevant information can be found on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders.

Please note that the bid submission date has been cancelled. [1](#1) 


References and Footnotes
========================

[1] Due to complications [1](#fn-1) in the solicitation process, this tender is cancelled.
